x

| 6 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 7 | 3 | #P_curry1f | |- ( ( S : ( CC X. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) --> ( BaseSet ` U ) /\ -u 1 e. CC ) -> N : ( BaseSet ` U ) --> ( BaseSet ` U ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylancl | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> N : ( BaseSet ` U ) --> ( BaseSet ` U ) ) |

| 20 | 3 | #P_curry1val | |- ( ( S Fn ( CC X. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) /\ -u 1 e. CC ) -> ( N ` x ) = ( -u 1 S x ) ) |
| 21 | 19, 6, 20 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ x e. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) -> ( N ` x ) = ( -u 1 S x ) ) |
| 22 | 4, 1, 2, 13 | #P_nvinv | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ x e. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) -> ( -u 1 S x ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` x ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ x e. ( BaseSet ` U ) ) -> ( N ` x ) = ( ( inv ` G ) ` x ) ) |
| 24 | 10, 16, 23 | #P_eqfnfvd | |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> N = ( inv ` G ) ) |
